identificationModule.briefTitle: Ramelteon for Insomnia Comorbid With Asthma
identificationModule.officialTitle: Ramelteon for Insomnia Comorbid With Asthma

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This trial will test the efficacy and safety of ramelteon, a selective melatonin agonist, on patients with insomnia comorbid with asthma.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Subjects with insomnia comorbid with asthma will be randomized to placebo or ramelteon at night for 6 weeks.

primaryOutcomes.description:
The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups.

PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)

primaryOutcomes.description:
The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups.

PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms

secondaryOutcomes.description: Score of 0-24, with 24 being the most sleepy
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)

secondaryOutcomes.description:
DSST tests the number of correct digit-symbol pairs that an individual can identify within an allotted period (60-90 sec). It test memory and concentration, among other parameters.

DSST score can range from 0-125, with 125 being the most number correct during the allotted time period.
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Daytime Lung Function (Peak Flow Monitoring) in Liter/Min
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: baseline and during treatment period (during 5th week)

groups.title: Ramelteon
groups.description: Participants with insomnia and asthma are randomized to Ramelteon 8mg and sleep hygiene for 5 weeks or to placebo and sleep hygiene for 5 weeks. Ramelteon or placebo to be taken within 30 minutes before

outcomeMeasures.title: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index
outcomeMeasures.description:
The change in ISI and PSQI from baseline to end of study will be compared between the two groups.

PSQI has a score range of 0-21, with lower the number being less sleep disturbances ISI has a score range of 0-28, with lower score meaning less insomnia symptoms
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The 2 subjects in the Ramelteon group completed the study. The 1 subject in the placebo group did not complete the study.
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)

outcomeMeasures.title: Daytime Performance (Digit Symbol Substitution Test)
outcomeMeasures.description:
DSST tests the number of correct digit-symbol pairs that an individual can identify within an allotted period (60-90 sec). It test memory and concentration, among other parameters.

DSST score can range from 0-125, with 125 being the most number correct during the allotted time period.
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The 2 subjects in the Ramelteon group completed the study. The 1 subject in the placebo group did not complete the study.
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: baseline and post-treatment (at end of 5 weeks)

limitationsAndCaveats.description: Recruitment difficulties led to only 3 participants in the study. Only 2 participants finished the study.
